programme.desc: We head back to the Ram's Head Center Stage at Maryland Live for our invite-only cash game.

programme.title: Poker Night In America

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 1 - It Begins
programme.desc: We collect the best poker streamers from Twitch.tv, as well as a few notable Vegas pros, to host our first ever Twitch Celebrity Cash Game. From a secret location in Las Vegas, NV we find out if the streamers can hang with the live players...or vise versa...featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 2 - Rampage
programme.desc: Our exclusive Twitch Celebrity Cash Game is in full swing, and the only thing more outrageous than the personalities is the pot sizes. From a private residence living room in Las Vegas, NV, this is cash game poker at its most entertaining. Featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 3 - The Kissing Bet
programme.desc: The Twitch Celebrity Cash Game in Las Vegas barrels on into the night as our curated collection of Twitch streamers and Vegas pros swap chips and insults. Featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 4 - "Damn, Daniel!"
programme.desc: As word gets around Las Vegas that our cash game is in full swing, some notable players stop by and try and get in. Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 5 - Psychic Flow
programme.desc: The poker from Las Vegas continues apace, and Phil Laak channels the psychic energy of the universal overmind to hone his poker play. Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game - Part 6 - Aces On The Felt, Aces That Fly
programme.desc: After losing the biggest pot in Poker Night history, Antonio Esfandiari is slowing regaining ground. Can he continue to build his stack against the best online and live players in Vegas? Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Settle in for a "friendly" game of poker in upstate New York with us as we visit Turning Stone Resort Casino. Featuring Mike Sigel, Dew Micali, Matt Glantz, Steve Ruddock, Jared Bleznick, Samantha Abernathy, Shaun Deeb, Joe McKeehen, and Mike Dentale

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: All it takes is a few All-Ins to put these pros on tilt. Find out who ends up getting felted, from our exclusive cash game at Turning Stone Resort Casino in Upstate New York. Featuring Mike Sigel, Dew Micali, Matt Glantz, Rep Porter, Jared Bleznick, Samantha Abernathy, Shaun Deeb, Joe McKeehen, and Mike Dentale

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Nothing brings the mood at the table down faster than a sore loser after a bad beat...which is EXACTLY what happens in this episode. The tension is thick at Turning Stone Resort Casino. Featuring Mike Sigel, Bart Hanson, Matt Glantz, Rep Porter, Jared Bleznick, Samantha Abernathy, Shaun Deeb, Joe McKeehen, and Mike Dentale

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Joe McKeehen and Tom Canulli square off at our table months ahead of their 2015 WSOP final table show down. Featuring Richard Anthony, Dominick Christiano, Alec Torelli, Thomas Cannuli, Matt Glantz, Travell Thomas, Joe McKeehen, Shaun Deeb, and Bart Hanson

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: There are some hurt feelings after some big hands in this invite-only cash game from Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, NY. Featuring Richard Anthony, Rep Porter, Alec Torelli, Thomas Cannuli, Mike Dentale, Travell Thomas, Joe McKeehen, Shaun Deeb, and Bart Hanson

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Two prominent poker coaches square off on our table from Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, NY. Featuring Richard Anthony, Rep Porter, Alec Torelli, Thomas Cannuli, Mike Dentale, Travell Thomas, Joe McKeehen, Shaun Deeb, and Bart Hanson

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: There is an alligator in the parking lot, and Hellmuth's luck runs out at Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Jared Jaffee, Sorel Mizzi, Matt Glantz, Alec Torelli, Matt Affleck, Michael Sigel, Ben Tarzia, Jennifer Tilly, Samantha Abernathy, Dan O'Brien, and Phil Hellmuth

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Jennifer Tilly tries to dig herself out of a hole. Featuring Jared Jaffee, Sorel Mizzi, Matt Glantz, Alec Torelli, Matt Affleck, Michael Sigel, Ben Tarzia, Jennifer Tilly, Samanta Abernathy, Dan O'Brien, and Phil Hellmuth

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Laak and Hellmuth square off, and Jess Dawley shows us the breakfast of champions. Featuring Alec Torelli, Phil Laak, Asher Conniff, Josh Beckley, Abbey Daniels, Joe McKeehen, Phil Hellmuth, Jessica Dawley, Michael Laake, Esther Taylor-Brady, Blake Bohn

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Laak has good news and bad news for Hellmuth as our cash game winds down at Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Alec Torelli, Phil Laak, Asher Conniff, Josh Beckley, Abbey Daniels, Joe McKeehen, Phil Hellmuth, Jessica Dawley, Michael Laake, Esther Taylor-Brady, Blake Bohn

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We bring our invite-only cash game to Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and a new player calculates the odds. Featuring Matt Glantz, Sam Ganzfried, Dave Eldridge, David Baker, Igor Ioffe, Jennifer Harman, Phil Laak, Dan Wolf, and Jennifer Tilly.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We continue our cash game from the Rivers Casino, and we begin the first part of our series featuring the poker playing artificial intelligence named "Claudico". Featuring Matt Glantz, Sam Ganzfried, Dave Eldridge, David Baker, Igor Ioffe, Jennifer Harman, Phil Laak, Dan Wolf, and Jennifer Tilly.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our cash game meanders on at the Rivers Casino, and we show Part 2 of our series featuring the poker-playing artificial intelligence named "Claudico". Featuring Tom Schneider, Dan Wolf, Mike Vierheller, David Baker, Jack Schanbacher, Phil Laak, Igor "Eric" Ioffe, and Mark "Pegasus" Smith

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Tom Schneider carpet bombs donkeys, and we conclude our artificial intelligence feature highlighting "Claudico", and advanced poker playing AI. Featuring Tom Schneider, Dan Wolf, Mike Vierheller, David Baker, Jack Schanbacher, Phil Laak, Igor "Eric" Ioffe, and Mark "Pegasus" Smith.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We bring our cash game for the first time to Choctaw Resort Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Pros and locals square off, and Jim Carrol has a bag of tricks. Featuring Cate Hall, Brandon Cantu, Todd Brunson, Dennis Phillips, BJ Imejjane, Kage Gardner, George Ritacco, Phil Hellmuth, and Jim Carroll

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our game continues from Choctaw Casino Resort in Durant, Oklahoma, and props fly across the tabe. Featuring Cate Hall, Brandon Cantu, Todd Brunson, Dennis Phillips, BJ Imejjane, Kage Gardner, George Ritacco, Phil Hellmuth, and Jim Carroll

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We bring in a new cast of characters to give their best at Choctaw Casino Resort. Featuring Etay Brady, Daphne Turner, Matt Russell, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Phil Hellmuth, Craig Stanley, Gavin Smith, Greg Himmelbrand, and Alec Torelli

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We find out why bluffs are like potato chips at Choctaw Resort Casino. Featuring Etay Brady, Daphne Turner, Matt Russell, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Phil Hellmuth, Craig Stanley, Gavin Smith, Greg Himmelbrand, and Alec Torelli

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Face Up With Phil Hellmuth: Part 1
programme.desc: Texahoma Hold'em at its best from Choctaw Casino Resort. Also, we go deep with Phil Hellmuth in our first ever interview segment called Face Up. Featuring Nelda Escamilla, Alec Torelli, Phil Hellmuth, Todd Brunson, Dany George, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Gavin Smith, Jason Ettredge, and Cate Hall

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Face Up With Phil Hellmuth: Part 2
programme.desc: Texahoma locals show our pros a few tricks. Also, we conclude our first ever Face Up interview with Phil Hellmuth. Featuring Nelda Escamilla, Alec Torelli, Phil Hellmuth, Todd Brunson, Dany George, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Gavin Smith, Jason Ettredge, and Cate Hall

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We head back to Seminole Hard Rock Casino in Hollywood, Florida with a few of our favorite poker players. Some of them wake up with good hands, but others are stuck in a chip nightmare. Featuring Ian O'hara, Stewart Newman, Phil Laak, Mukul Pahuja, Phil Hellmuth, Alec Torelli, David Silverman, Jeff Gross, Matt Seidman

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Seminole Hard Rock Casino in Hollywood, FL hosts our cash game while the players test out different eyewear at the table. Featuring Ian O'hara, Stewart Newman, Phil Laak, Noah Schwartz, Phil Hellmuth, Alec Torelli, David Silverman, Jeff Gross, Matt Seidman

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We head to Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA where our very own Chris Hanson becomes an honorary Kentucky Colonel. Plus, our crew tells the harrowing tale of #GroundPizza. Featuring Matt Glantz, Chris Horter, Mark Smith, Phil Laak, Dave Eldridge, Jennifer Harman, Tom Schneider

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The locals in Pittsburgh show the pros how its done from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Jennifer Tilly, Chris Horter, Nick Immekus, David Baker, Dan Wolf, Jennifer Harman, Jason Andrews, Dave Eldridge, Matt Glantz, Phil Laak, Tom Schneider, Mark Smith

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Poker Night in America makes its first visit to Thunder Valley Casino Resort just outside of Sacramento, CA. Featuring Mark Kroon, Maria Ho, Scott Ball, Phil Hellmuth, Alan Richardson, Lorrie Corvin, Mike Ross

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We continue our cash game from Thunder Valley Casino Resort, and as individual chip fortunes rise and fall some players realize their good fortune overall. Featuring Rep Porter, Maria Ho, Scott Ball, Phil Hellmuth, Alan Richardson, Bart Hanson, Mike Ross

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Some of Phil Hellmuth's best friends from Silicon Valley join our table at Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Anthony Pagan, Jason Calacanis, David Baker, Phil Hellmuth, Tom West, Chamath Palihapitiya, Taylor Paur
